/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the rich history and culture of the city. Trees and power lines add a touch of nature and modernity to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding depth to the image. The sun shines brightly, casting shadows and highlighting the colors of the scene.
